Leinster Trophy

Where Legends Begin

The 78th Leinster Trophy

12th September 2021

Mondello Park International Circuit
Donore, Naas, Co. Kildare, Ireland

Entry Tickets

Leinster Trophy Drivers

The Leinster Trophy winners and podium finishers have gone on to compete at the highest levels of motorsport. Whilst today the Leinster Trophy competitors race single seat race cars it wasn't always the case. Some of the past drivers have switched to GT racing or to prototypes and have gone on to compete at the Le-Mans 24 Hours. Some have gone across the pond, either returning home or in search of success, to compete in the Indycar championship and the famous Indy 500. Whilst others have continued their single seat careers and have reached the highest rung on the motorsport ladder, Formula One. Amongst their many achievements and storied careers, we have a few highlights.

Formula 1

6 World Drivers Championships 80 Race Wins 202 Podium finishes 1300 Race starts

Indycar

3 Indianapolis 500 Victories 13 Race Wins 29 Podium finishes

Le Mans 24 Hours

9 Outright Wins 8 Outright Podiums 3 Class Wins

Legendary Drivers

Aryton Senna

3x F1 World Champion

Mika Hakkinen
